name: Design Homepage UI
desc: Create a responsive homepage layout using Tailwind CSS.

name: Integrate Authentication
desc: Implement user login and registration with JWT authentication.

name: Setup Database
desc: Configure MongoDB database and create necessary collections.

name: Task Filtering Feature
desc: Implement filters for tasks based on status and due dates.

name: Optimize API Performance
desc: Improve API response times by adding indexes and caching.

name: Deploy to Production
desc: Deploy the application to Vercel and connect the backend.
